name: Cream Bear Earflap Hat
description:
This adorable bear hat would look so cute on your little guy or girl. Warm and cozy. Perfect for professional photos or everyday use. Made with 100% super soft bulky yarn. Super soft ,stretchy and cozy for your little one's head. Brown flower is securely sewn on. Hat is available with or without flower.


Also visit my shop to see other cute hats and photo props
www.littlebugaboos.com

Like me on Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Little-Bugaboos/224523370909223


****Care instructions: Hand wash only. Lay flat to dry. This will help maintain shape longer.

Please convo me with size along with any questions that you may have. If a size is not specified, then newborn will be sent to you.

*****Special thanks to Giselle S. Photography for the beautiful photos. Please visit her at www.facebook.com/pages/Giselle-S-Photography/386846991350881

name: Brown Sock Monkey Hat
description:
Who's monkeying around? This adorable sock monkey hat is just too cute for words. Hat is made with 100% soft acrylic yarn in barley brown with cream and cranberry accents with black button eyes. Buttons are securely sewn on. Great shower gift or photo prop.

Also check out my other items in my store at www.littlebugaboos.com

Like me on Facebook 
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Little-Bugaboos/224523370909223

***Caution: Buttons are a choking hazard. Please do not leave baby unattended when wearing this hat.

****Care instructions: Hand wash only. Lay flat to dry. This will help maintain shape longer.

Please convo me with size along with any questions that you may have. If a size is not specified, then newborn size will be sent to you.

****Special thanks to Sarah Elizabeth Photography for the beautiful photos. Please visit her at www.sarahelizabethphotography.net

name: Baby Oatmeal Fedora
description:
Go old school with this cute fedora.  I hear Frank Sinatra singing in the background.  This precious little fedora would make a perfect gift, photo prop or accessory. Hat is made with 100% soft acrylic yarn in Oatmeal Tweed with black band. 
The hat is available in the following sizes

Newborn - 12"-13"
0-3 mos. - 13"- 14"
3-6 mos. - 14"- 16"
6-12 mos. - 16"- 18"
12-24 mos. - 17"-19"
2T-5T - 20"-22"

****Care instructions: Hand wash only. Lay flat to dry. This will help maintain shape longer.

*****Special thanks to Sarah Elizabeth Photography for the beautiful photos. Please visit her at www.sarahelizabethphotography.net

name: Froggy Diaper Cover and Hat Photo Prop Set
description:
Let's hop to it! This little froggy hat is too cute and would look absolutely adorable on your little one. Hat and diaper cover are made with 100% acrylic yarn. Hat has black buttons for eyes. Buttons are securely sewn on. Great photo prop. Hat and diaper cover may be sold as a set or separately

The hat is available in the following sizes

Newborn - 12"-13"
0-3 mos. - 13"- 14"
3-6 mos. - 14"- 16"
6-12 mos. - 16"- 18"

Diaper cover is available in newborn and 0-3 mos.

***Caution: Buttons are a choking hazard. Please do not leave baby unattended when wearing this hat.

****Care instructions: Hand wash only. Lay flat to dry. This will help maintain shape longer.

*****Special thanks to Nancie J. Photography for the beautiful photos. Please visit her at www.nanciejphotography.com

name: Cream with Light Pink Flower Barefoot Sandals
description:
Do you have trouble keeping your baby's shoes on? These cute little barefoot sandals would compliment any outfit and baby will have a hard time getting them off. Made of 100% acrylic yarn in lamb with a pink flower and pearl beads. Flower and beads are securely sewn on. Sandal is adjustable up to 12 months.

**Care instructions: Hand wash only. Lay flat to dry. This will help maintain shape longer.


***Special thanks to MJ Photography for the beautiful photos. Please contact her at marjorie.m.jones [!at] comcast.net
